Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Dish
Description: Large circular dish with a flat base and simple lip. The carefully polished interior surface was covered with a pale red-brown colour on to which a dark red geometrical pattern was painted. This consists of a central circular motif with radiating wavy lines. The exterior surface bears a dark red slip.
